amendment.description: To provide funds for trail construction on the Wasatch-Cache National Forest.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1757 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1757 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11813-11814; text: CR S11814) To provide funds for trail construction on the Wasatch-Cache National Forest.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1757 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1757 proposed by Senator Burns.
